prompts: Create a deer-like Pokemon with antlers that glows in the dark.
I want a Normal-type Pokemon that thrives in forested areas.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a stag with bright yellow accents.
Make a creature that combines elements of a deer and a mystical spirit.
Imagine a majestic Pokemon with a unique body shape and vibrant colors.
Design a Pokemon that embodies both grace and strength in its appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that is perfect for living in grassy habitats.
